Reviews.Title: Great Computer for a better deal.
Reviews.Author: RICHARD W DUGGER
Reviews.Content: Big monitor, fast computer, HD webcam. This thing is great so far. I have owned Acer in the past and was happy with it as well.

Reviews.Title: Acer good
Reviews.Author: Howard Katz
Reviews.Content: It was what we were hoping for. With Windows 7 eliminated the 8 issues. Great for people with not as much computer literacy to change to Windows 8

Reviews.Title: Acer Is Awesome!!!!
Reviews.Author: RicknDonna
Reviews.Content: This is my 3rd Acer laptop and it sure lives up to it reputation. This laptop is fast and has all item listed in the description.I have had other brands in the past and paid a lot of  money for those brands but I am here today to let you know save your money and get an Acer. You will not regret it.I hope this information helps you in your decision making I know the Amazon reviews have helped me a lot with my Amazon purchases.Enjoy..................

Reviews.Title: Acer P2020M NX.MGAAA.004;E1-731-4699 17.3-Inch Laptop
Reviews.Author: sanhope
Reviews.Content: My purchased was for my husband.  This is our 4th Acer.  He is not a techie so he loves that all the processes are comfortable to operate and easy to learn new.  We both love Windows 7 and it is hard to find.  Not interested in Windows 8.  As we all know how much of an improvement Window 7 is from Vista you can't even compare the two. The 17.3 screen is larger than his last.  The clarity of the screen is awesome on Acer for the price

Reviews.Title: Bought it for the mother-in-law and it is working out well
Reviews.Author: Wild Blue Yonder "Dr. Zulu"
Reviews.Content: I had it shipped to my place and did some tailoring to make the desktop look as much like the XP2003 version that the Acer was replacing.In general I was impressed working with this machine. Windows 7 is not as bad as I thought it was going to be and the OS made it easy to navigate. The Acer seems to be robust, the built-in video cam is high quality and overall seems like a responsive machine with the caveat that I was doing simple things.I liked the feel of the keyboard. I disabled the pad and bought a wifi mouse since my mother-in-law has not had pad experience and I thought keeping things as they were was best policy. Next time we visit, I will ask her if she would like to try the pad and turn it on for a trial run if she says yes.

Reviews.Title: DVD player
Reviews.Author: Delano W Bolter
Reviews.Content: The DVD player  does not operate properly as the manual button is nonfunctional, it will open only by going to computer and using eject plus it will not recognize a blank disc in order to create a backup.etc.

Reviews.Title: 5 Star in my Book
Reviews.Author: Sandra McKinnon
Reviews.Content: I liked the price, the size of the screen, Acer appears to be a very reliable brand,  It arrived just a few days after I ordered it and I am very pleased with the purchase,

Reviews.Title: not real thrilled with labtop purchase
Reviews.Author: Miranda Brink
Reviews.Content: Wanted windows 7. Not a Windows 8 fan. All computers in stores are only windows 8. When I got this labtop it was constantly having popups and always wanting to backup your pc. I have installed malwarebytes and it found 400 malwares on this supposedly brand new computer!

Reviews.Title: Does the job
Reviews.Author: Keith E Keller
Reviews.Content: Was looking for a new computer to replace a failed 17 inch HP. The 17 inch running WINDOWS 8 with touchscreen were more than I wanted to pay, especially given 8s reputation. This Acer running WINDOWS 7 is just what I need, though would have liked backlit keys.

Reviews.Title: Acer P2020M 17.3 inch laptop with Windows 7.
Reviews.Author: David Burris Sr
Reviews.Content: This item meets my requirement. I gave it this rating because word and excel is not included, although it is available for a fee.I would recommend the Acer product for the beginner or the veteran user.

Reviews.Title: Very happy
Reviews.Author: Sherry Kanosky
Reviews.Content: Very happy with this laptop.  Basic computer but has all my daughter needs to get her college work done.  Added Microsoft office without problem.

Reviews.Title: wonderful
Reviews.Author: Robert M. Gassner
Reviews.Content: I have used window 98, ME, XP which I still have on my desktop, and windows 7.  After receiving a Toshiba which I did not like the feel of the keys, with windows 8 which i despised, this laptop after returning the Toshiba, was like returning to an old friend.  The keys feel much better on this laptop, and even though it has a newer version of windows 7, can figure out what doesn't load and work the same as on old laptop.  When it comes time to get another laptop, will spend 3 times the money and buy a mac if windows does not come out with a more user friendly program by then..

Reviews.Title: Our previous computer developed a fatal problem, we had to bid farewell to it. The new Acer computer replaceed it and then some.
Reviews.Author: hugh hines
Reviews.Content: It was such a wonderful experience dealing with Amazon. com. We were delighted wit the computer, and the turn around time. Great job.

Reviews.Title: Two Defects in this Acer
Reviews.Author: TerryK
Reviews.Content: I wanted another Acer because my first one was so good. However, this one had a cracked cover and loose button for inserting battery so I sent it back and got an HP, which works great.

ProductInfo.Features:
Intel Intel_Pentium_Dual_Core_2020M 2.4 GHz
4.0 GB DDR3
500.0 GB 5400.0 rpm Hard Drive
17.3-Inch Screen
Windows 7 Home Premium 64-bit
ProductInfo.Name: Acer P2020M NX.MGAAA.004;E1-731-4699 17.3-Inch Laptop
